longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 6 months from the arrival date.
- British passports endorsed  British Citizen  that have been
  extended 12 months by an extension stamp contained within
  the passport are accepted.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders
of British passports endorsed  British Citizen  (not
applicable to holders of Emergency and Temporary Passport, who
must obtain a visa on arrival).
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of an ROC (Taiwan) Business and Academic Travel Card, issued
by Chinese Taipei. 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Citizen  (applicable when holding an
Emergency or Temporary Passport) can obtain a visa on arrival,
for a max. stay of 30 days, provided:
 (SEE NOTE 43278)  
    NOTE 43278: Available only at Taiwan Taoyuan International
   Airport (TPE), Kaohsiung (KHH), Taichung (RMQ) or Taipei
   Song Shan (TSA).
Visa required, except for Permanent residents of Hong Kong
(SAR China) BORN in Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR China)
can obtain "Entry Permit" on arrival, for a max. stay of 30
days, provided  
Visa required, except for Permanent residents of Hong Kong
(SAR China) NOT BORN in Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR
China), who have made previous visits to Chinese Taipei, can
obtain an "Entry permit" on arrival for a max. stay of 30
days, provided  
Minors:
- For children (up to/incl. 19 years) traveling
  
Additional Information:
- A valid visa in an expired passport
  
- Visitors are required to hold documents for their next
  destination.
- Extension of stay for another 90 days is possible for
  holders of British passports endorsed  British Citizen .
- Former nationals of China (People's Rep.)
   
- Permanent residents of Hong Kong (SAR China) and Macao (SAR
  China) NOT BORN in Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR
  China), who have obtained an Online Entry Permit
  
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry
